examples:
What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Can someone please call me. I want canva pro and thought I paid for it. But now it is not showing up properly.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: My name is Melissa Sheire <EMAIL> I paid for the year on December 10th and now I cannot access my paid account.  I am so frustrated there is no way to talk to a customer service rep - so frustrating.  My number is <NUMBER>if someone can call me. Thanks

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I have paid for Canva pro (was paid on Dec 16th through Apple - Order ID MN3TL6HTYY. Can someone please call me <NUMBER>email is <EMAIL> It will not work and I paid for it! Thank you.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I paid for a full year subscription, but it's not active? Please refer to an invoice <NUMBER>on April 9, 2020 ($119.40 Paid)

Please fix this. Is there a number I can call with future concerns/questions?

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I paid my account through apple store but looks like I am going to be charged again in a couple days can someone please call me 
<NUMBER>

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I have a question about the Pro account but I didn't see another customer service option. Can I roll documents from other free accounts into a new paid pro Canva account? Please respond to <EMAIL> when you can. Thank you!

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I paid for an upgrade to a professional account in September 2020. I have been emailing/contacting your customer service since then trying to amend this issue and have access to the account I paid for, but no one has been able to resolve the issue. Please help!!

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: And this is not even saying it is my paid account??

What kind of problem is it ?: Others Describe the problem: Hi, how are you? My paid subscription expires on February 20, and to renew it I need INVOICE A, could you contact me to manage this? Thank you!

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Please this is the second time I've written to you, my profile is telling me i didn't paid my subscription but i have the charge on my bank statements and my apple ID subscription. I need a response.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi, 

I remember i subscribed to your premium account and paid for it, but my account says no subscription. Could you assist please?

Thank you.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Still a billing issue!! I just paid again and I still have no access!! I’m over this

Describe the issue: Canva emailed saying I havent paid. However your yearly fee payment has already been deducted from my bank account. I cant seem to contact anyone so which makes it difficult to resolve.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Can't find my paid account, it might be with an email that no longer is active.
What kind of problem are you reporting ?: Other Describe the problem: Hello, please give me a detailed instruction on how to resign from a paid service user.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I can't find my paid account

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Still no Canva Pro even though I have paid for it. Fix this! I have deadlines!!! No response from you today at all. I sent proof of purchase. Just get it done for goodness sake. I am getting angry about it now.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Helloooooo...
I’m pro until 28 Dec 2021...
But I cant using pro tools...
Please, check the Billing...
I was paid IDR 499K using Apple id <EMAIL> for THIS account and I was paid with DANA...

Please, help me to THIS misscommunication. Thank you

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Pro Features, for which I have just paid the annual fee, are not available on my account. I have already been in contact, sent the invoice info, and as of last Friday have still heard from no one. Here is the info regarding the last request, Request Id: <NAME>>. I find it very frustrating to have already paid for something I cannot even use, which is holding up some of the work i need to be doing. I would appreciate a resolution to this situation as soon as possible. Thank you, Mrs. <NAME>

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I'm being billed for Canva Pro when I should not be; my team has paid for it in the past, but I have not signed up for it on my own to my knowledge.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hello!
My agency had paid the premium membership . But i am not able to use it  in may account. Not sure why. 
Please help me

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: hello,
I paid for canva on my phone and can't access any of what I've done on my <NAME>. Please help.

What do you need help with?: Hi there 

I purchased a yearly subscription from my iPhone using App Store 

However my canva pro feature has not been activated.

Despite several emails to you, I have not gotten any response in relation to this 

I have been charged by App Store. I have paid my credit card bill

If canva and App Store have not figured out their lack of communication or connection, why does the customer suffer?

I have paid for a yearly subscription.

Please help!

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Why can’t I get an answer to my questions? My Pro subscription won’t show up in my app or online. I paid through Apple. Apple can see it. They resent me the invoice which I sent along to your team, and I haven’t been able to get a response from you in days. I paid $120 for this and have yet to use it in days. This is abhorrent customer service. I was able to get in touch with Apple multiple times in the time I haven’t heard back from you. Is this what it’s going to be like anytime there’s something wrong? This needs to be remedied now.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I cannot access pro anymore, I have about 6 months left on my paid subscription. }Where is the help for this? I cannot talk to anyone, which is not good customer relations. I paid for a year via paypal .Please help me.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I’m still having issues with my app saying I do not have a subscription with you when I have paid $119 to have one. Can you please help me with this once and for all?? I paid for service and haven’t been able to use it.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I have paid for pro, but says I need to purchase. Please help.

Describe your issue: I paid for a Canva Pro account but some of the premium options are not available to me or my team.

Describe your issue: i sent mesaga about my problem but i can not get any feedback from canva. i subcribed for pro , but it does not work.  and canva already paid for one year subscription. i checked all my mails there is not any other account on my mails. so could you please check and activate my pro service .  its been almost one month that i started to use canva and still it is not active.. 
here is the invoice details 
order no: mk5q9gfst2 
sequence no : <NUMBER>r539

i am waiting for your prompt reply.

Team Canva

I paid for whole yr, app on ipad says paid till nov 2021 and still I’m getting this mail about giving credit card details.  
Please let me know how can I connect with your team. I tried connecting through support but my problem in not in list how can I go about it. Please help.
What do you need help with?: why i  cant use some service , i already paid montly subscription.

What do you need help with?: I paid for a subscription on November 19th and it does not appear to be active on my account.

Describe your issue: I have paid and sent copy of receipt for my pro subscription but I am still not receiving my pro features. I emailed the copy of the receipt yesterday to customer service and have not heard anything. I use this for my business daily so I’m trying to resolve the issue. Thank you!

Describe the issue: All of the features I’ve paid for or not available to me – I have been trying to get this resolved for one month please help me my blood pressure is so high and I am getting very upset

Are the pro features not available until after the 30 day trial even thought I paid for a full year of Pro? Thank you.
